nodes.text: Eidolon Security datacenter was a datacenter owned by the Eidolon Security company founded by an assassin named Eidolon. During the Great Hunt (c. 3643 BBY) a Hunter assaulted the Eidolon Security datacenter and leaked their data into the Holonet to draw Eidolon, who was a target of the Great Hunt, out of hiding.
Eidolon Security datacenter appear as an area on Nar Shaddaa in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
